name: @AutoPagerize - Page Break 01
description:
Original page break looks simple but a little bit old-fashoned.
Why not use better page break!
Inspired by "os0x" http://d.hatena.ne.jp/os0x/20081209/1228835661 (though written in Japanese)

Recently, I wrote NEW one for Firefox 3.6+. See http://userstyles.org/styles/24555

For AutoPager? See http://userstyles.org/styles/35790

Note: 
　1. Duplicated ***-radius is reserved for cross-browser compatibility.
　2. AutoPagerize? It's a Greasemonkey Script used to concatenate separated long-listed pages like google.
　　See http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/8551 for detail.
　3. Your feedback is welcome.（日本語可）
